fehd.ADR_EN: 3/F, LHT TOWER, 31 QUEEN’S ROAD CENTRAL, HONG KONG AND AN OUTSIDE SEATING ACCOMMODATION AT FLAT ROOF OF 3/F, LHT TOWER, 31 QUEEN'S ROAD CENTRAL, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港皇后大道中31號陸海通大廈3樓 及3樓頂層平台露天座位間

geocode_en.formatted_address: 3/F, Lht Tower Podium, Central, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 3/F, Lht Tower Podium, Central, 香港

result.adr_address: 3/F, Lht Tower Podium, Central, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 3/F, Lht Tower Podium, Central, Hong Kong
result.name: Spiga

reviews.text: Quiet and cozy environment, nice decoration and ambience too.  The salad buffet has a good collection of vege, cold cut and soup.  You can add a main course at reasonable price.
Wonderful lunch buffet. Good value for money. Can be topped up with pizza and other side dishes. Recommended for lunch. Never been here for dinner.

Myself and few friends came here after a recommendation through work.

Had a brilliant evening and was well taken care of by Giacomo and team, the food was delicious! we had lobster linguini and risotto.

Finished the evening on the outdoor terrace with a few drinks, very chilled vibe. Will be back. 5/5

A nice decor but food is average, especially given the prices they charge. My friend's stake was "all fat". My dishes were better but starter + main course left me feeling hungry and having to finish off my not-so-hungry other mate's pizza.

Lovely outdoor terrace in the middle of Central! Such a find! They had a DJ on that Sunday afternoon - such a chill and lounge-vibe. The restaurant looked amazing although I did not eat there yet.
Drinks were good and reasonably priced for the quality and location, and the service team is friendly and attentive!
